titleStmt.title: Robert the III King of Scotland, his answer to a summonds sent by Henry the IV. of England, to do homage for the crown of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Steel, G., attributed name.

publicationStmt.date: printed in the year, M. DCC. [1700]

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to G. Steel (cf. Wing).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
